title.rendered: U.S. Embassy supports Nkwatia Senior High School to Meet Sanitation Needs.

content.rendered:
The U.S. Embassy in Accra, through the Ambassadors Special Self-Help Program, supported the Nkwatia Senior High School with $10,000 to construct a toilet facility to meet the sanitation needs of a growing number of students. On September 4, our Management Counselor Greg Morrison commissioned the opening of the facility in the Eastern Region, joined by a number of local dignitaries.

The Ambassador’s Special Self-Help Program provides assistance to small, community-led projects that promise to have an immediate impact. The project must be initiated by the community and should benefit the community by increasing income or improving living conditions. Read more about the program here: https://bit.ly/2kDVxYd
